title: Vibration Dampening
description: SRP has been providing custom converted vibration dampening gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

seo.title: Vibration Dampening
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted vibration dampening gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

content: SRP has been providing custom converted vibration dampening gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

blocks.title: Vibration Dampening Gaskets Features
blocks.content:
• Easy to die-cut, fabricate
  • Can be supplied adhesive backed
  • Available in a variety of material formulations
  • Available in a variety of densities
  • Available in a variety of thicknesses

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Improve Vibration Isolation Efficiency
  • Provide Long Term Durability
  • Increase Long Term Stability
  • Meet a wide variety of design requirements
  • Offer ease of Installment

blocks.title: Common materials for Vibration Dampening Gaskets
blocks.content:
• PORON ShockPad Foam
  • PORON ShockSeal Polyurethane
  • PORON 4701-60 Polyurethane
  • BISCO HT-820 Silicone Foam
  • Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
  • 3M Acrylic Foam Tapes
  • 3M Double Coated Foam Tapes
  • Griswold Open Cell Sponge

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Cushioning
  • Gap Filling
  • Gasketing & Sealing
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control
  • Anti-vibration pads for equipment
  • Flat elastic bearings for HVAC equipment and subsystems (fans, chillers, pumps)
  • Decoupling of vents, pipes and walls
  • Isolating foundations for pumps, presses, generators or highly sensitive equipment
  • Noise, vibration, harshness pads for automotive interior applications
  • Isolating the foundations of buildings
  • Protecting internal components in phones, tablets, and computers

title: Electrical Enclosure
description: SRP has been providing custom converted electrical enclosure gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

seo.title: Electrical Enclosure
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted electrical enclosure gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

media.name: Enclosure_Gasket_copy_7dca2b77d7.jpg
media.alternativeText: Custom Electrical Enclosure Gaskets and Seals
media.caption: uploads/Enclosure_Gasket_copy_7dca2b77d7.jpg

content: SRP has been providing custom converted electrical enclosure gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

blocks.title: Electrical Enclosure Gaskets features:
blocks.content:
• Compression Set Resistance
  • Temperature Resistance
  • Weather Resistance
  • Flame Resistance
  • Chemical Resistance
  • Environmental Sealing
  • Gap Filling

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Eliminating potential maintenance and replacement gasket costs
  • Maintaining enclosure standards and ratings (NEMA, UL, IP,  IEC, and CSA)
  • Preserving electrical components within the enclosure
  • Preventing indirect damage to the systems controlled by damaged components
  • Reputation of the enclosure manufacturer

blocks.title: Common materials used for Electrical Enclosure Gaskets
blocks.content:
• 3M Adhesive Tapes
  • PORON AquaPro Polyurethane
  • BISCO HT-840 Silicone Foam
  • Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
  • PORON 4701-50 Polyurethane

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Cushioning
  • EMI Shielding
  • Flame Barrier
  • Gap Filling
  • Gasketing & Sealing
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control
  • Temperature exposure: What temperature will the material reach and for how long?
  • UV/Ozone resistance: Will the material be directly exposed?
  • Flame resistance: Flame rating requirements such as UL-V0, UL-HBF, or MVSS-302
  • Chemical resistance: Will the material contact chemicals or fluids?
  • Outgassing: Could material outgassing be detrimental to components?
  • Gap spacing: What is the thickness range of the gap?
  • Gasket size: Are there limitations on gasket format (die-cut vs. stripping)?
  • Gasket function: Sealing liquids, solids or air; mitigate shock or vibration, etc.
  • Color: Identify standard and nonstandard offerings
  • Budgetary considerations: Understand cost vs. performance

blocks.title: Features

title: Adhesive Backed
description: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

seo.title: Adhesive Backed
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

content: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.

blocks.title: Choosing the right adhesive backed gasket:
blocks.content:
• Adhesion properties – What is the gasket sticking to?
  • Temperature capabilities – What temperature range is required?
  • Chemical compatibility – Will the gasket be exposed to any chemicals?
  • UV resistance – Will the gasket be exposed to outdoor elements?
  • Special properties – Electrically/thermally conductive, flame retardant?

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Attach gaskets to metal, plastic, glass, wood and more
  • Peel and stick for quicker assembly times
  • Gasket positioning
  • Add dimensional stability
  • Can be supplied kiss-cut on a roll for even quicker assembly
  • Mounting displays, signs, posters, mirrors, name-plates

blocks.title: Typical Materials Used for Adhesive Backed Gaskets
blocks.content:
• 3M Adhesive Transfer Tapes
  • PORON 4701-30 Polyurethane
  • BISCO HT-800 Silicone Foam
  • Closed Cell Sponge Rubber Gaskets
  • Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
  • Griswold Open Cell Sponge

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Gasketing & Sealing
  • Bonding & Attaching
  • LED Lighting
  • Thermal Solutions
  • Cushioning
  • Battery Pads & Cushions
  • Gap Filling
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control

We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. EMI Shielding gaskets and seals can be custom fabricated to your exact specifications and requirements.

blocks.title: EMI Shielding Gasket Features
blocks.content:
• Tensile Strength
  • Tear Resistance
  • Thermal Stability/Conductivity
  • Particle Filled Silicones

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Voltage Endurance
  • Thermal Conductivity
  • Excellent dielectric strength shields against electrical surges
  • Mechanical Toughness

blocks.title: Common EMI Shielding Gasket Materials
blocks.content:
• 3M ThermaVolt Insulation Paper
  • BISCO EC-2130 Silicone EMI Shields
  • Nomex Type 410
  • Formex Polypropylene
  • SSP EMI / RFI Conductive Silicones

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• EMI Shielding
  • Appliance Controls
  • Electronic Devices
  • Automotive Controls
  • Electrical Insulation
  • Circuit Breakers

title: LED Lighting
description: SRP is a leading provider of indoor and outdoor LED gaskets and thermal pads to the LED lighting industry. We manufacture custom converted components to withstand weather conditions and excessive heat to extend the life and performance of LED Lighting applications.

seo.title: LED Lighting
seo.description: SRP is a leading provider of indoor and outdoor LED gaskets and thermal pads to the LED lighting industry. We manufacture custom converted components to withstand weather conditions and excessive heat to extend the life and performance of LED Lighting applications.

content: SRP is a leading provider of indoor and outdoor LED gaskets and thermal pads to the LED lighting industry. We manufacture custom converted components to withstand weather conditions and excessive heat to extend the life and performance of LED Lighting applications.

blocks.title: Various materials can be fabricated to produce a variety of LED Lighting Gaskets including:
blocks.content:
• Weather Seals
  • Enclosure Gaskets
  • Bezel Gaskets
  • Thermal Interface Pads/Gaskets

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Ability to withstand outdoor weather conditions
  • Protection from dust, wind, rain and snow
  • Withstand extreme temperatures
  • NEMA Enclosure gaskets, IP and UL gaskets
  • Reduce heat buildup inside the component
  • Materials are easy to die-cut, fabricate

blocks.title: Common materials for LED Lighting Gaskets
blocks.content:
• 3M ThermaVolt Insulation Paper
  • 3M Flame Barrier FRB Series
  • 3M Thermal Interface Pads
  • BISCO HT-800 Silicone Foam
  • Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • PORON 4701-40 Polyurethane
  • SSP EMI / RFI Conductive Silicones

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Battery Pads & Cushions
  • EMI Shielding
  • Gap Filling
  • Gasketing & Sealing
  • LED Lighting
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control
  • Thermal Solutions

title: Flame Barrier
description: When it comes to flame barrier applications, SRP recommends materials from some of the most trusted brands in the industry, providing the reliability you need when it comes to safety. These materials are easy to die-cut and can be converted into custom shapes per customer requirements.

blocks.title: Flame Barrier Gasket Features
blocks.content:
• Flammability rated materials - 5VA, FMVSS-302
  • Heat resistance, strength, durability and dielectric properties
  • UV/Ozone resistant materials

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Dielectric strength
  • Mechanical toughness
  • Thermal stability

blocks.content:

  • Nomex Type 410
  • BISCO Flame Resistant Silicones
